volunteering.title: Career Forge Phase 01
volunteering.description: Contributed as a Secretary Team Member to Career Forge Phase 01, a career guidance program aimed at enhancing students' professional development.

volunteering.title: PearlHack 2.0
volunteering.description: Played a key role as an organizing committee member for PearlHack 2.0, a hackathon designed to foster creativity and technical skills among students.

volunteering.title: IEEE Innovation Sri Lanka Provincial Competition
volunteering.description: Successfully managed delegates for the IEEE Innovation Sri Lanka Provincial Competition, coordinating participants and ensuring smooth event execution.

certificates.title: CodeSprint 8 (IEEE Student Branch of IIT)
certificates.description: Recognized as semi-finalists in CodeSprint 8, a competitive coding event organized by the IEEE Student Branch of IIT, showcasing problem-solving and programming skills.

certificates.title: Code with WIE
certificates.description: Achieved finalist status in the Code with WIE competition, highlighting innovative thinking and technical abilities in a competitive environment.p

certificates.title: SLTC Inter-University Game Development Competition
certificates.description: Earned finalist recognition and popularity for creating a game trailer video in the SLTC Inter-University Game Development Competition, emphasizing creativity and storytelling.

hackathons.title: Industrial Visit
hackathons.description: Participated in the Industrial Visit for 2nd-year Software Engineering students to CodeGen International and Zone 24x7 on 9th February 2024, gaining valuable insights into technology and innovation.

hackathons.title: The Modern Javascript for Beginners
hackathons.description: I completed the 'Modern JavaScript for Beginners' course on Udemy, enhancing my understanding of JavaScript fundamentals and advanced concepts, including DOM manipulation and asynchronous programming.

hackathons.title: React.js Essential Training
hackathons.description: I successfully completed the 'React.js Essential Training' course on LinkedIn Learning, where I gained hands-on experience with React fundamentals, components, state management, and best practices for building dynamic, interactive web applications.

hackathons.title: Bootstrap 5 Essential Training
hackathons.description: I Successfully completed LinkedIn Learning's Bootstrap 5 Essential Training, mastering the creation of responsive, mobile-first websites with modern design techniques using Bootstrap.

hackathons.title: Tailwind CSS 3 Essential Training
hackathons.description: I Completed LinkedIn Learning's Tailwind CSS 3 Essential Training, gaining proficiency in building utility-first, customizable, and scalable web designs using Tailwind CSS.
